title: Unable to upload file with curl when --limit-rate is provided
body:
### I did this
```
curl -v -k -# --http2 --limit-rate 1M https://127.0.0.1:8443/upload/BPS.pdf -T /upload/BPS.pdf
```
### I expected the following

